svg.script: const test = async_test('checkIntersection() / checkEnclosure() with null ref. element'); window.onload = test.step_func_done(() => { const root = document.documentElement; assert_throws_js(TypeError, () => root.checkIntersection(null, root.createSVGRect())); assert_throws_js(TypeError, () => root.checkEnclosure(null, root.createSVGRect())); });
